title: HOW THE FUCK DO YOU LANE AGAINST NASUS!?
body:
the same shit happens everytime
1.he farms up undertower
2.cant dive him because of his dumb ult
3.cant catch him because of fucking wither
4.he starts to lifesteal whatever harass i put on to him
5.he starts destroying everyone with Q
6.he starts to destroy towers with two Q (who the fuck thought this was a good idea?)


sorry about the salt, its just that nasus has always been the bane of my existence and i really want to deal with this prick.
